disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Wednesday 9 March to end of Thursday 10 March GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Cloud cover and some sunny spells are forecast for Wednesday. Thursday will be cloudy in the morning with sunshine developing in the afternoon. <br/>Back trajectories show the air arriving in the UK from the south, however the winds will be strong enough to aid good dispersion of local emissions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>
